"スーパーハード受注許可証の所持"

"Manon has collapsed due to her excessive use of Overboost. Her inner Photons are almost fully depleted, and the only way she will recover is through use of a mysterious Photon crystal known as a \"Liminal Sign\". To save Manon's life, <%me> and the others begin searching for a Liminal Sign, though they don't even know what one looks like."
